name: Deep One Archimandrite
description: The Deep One Archimandrite is a Large humanoid characterized by strong physical attributes, especially a Strength score of 20, and features an unholy trident. Its skin is likely to resemble that of a deep-sea creature, hinting at its aquatic nature.
memorable: Its ability to summon reef sharks and use powerful spells makes it a unique threat in aquatic environments.
goals: To dominate the battlefield using its spellcasting and to summon aquatic allies.
relations: Often associates with other Deep Ones and aquatic creatures.
environment: Typically found in aquatic settings or near large bodies of water.
strengths: Strong melee capabilities with enhanced attacks from Frenzied Rage, alongside spellcasting without requiring material components.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage while resistant to cold and thunder damage.
attacks: Uses its Claws for slashing damage and the Unholy Trident for piercing and necrotic damage, along with a spell attack that can inflict lightning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Call of the Archimandrite, allowing it to summon aquatic allies to aid in combat.
senses: Possesses darkvision that extends 240 feet, enabling it to see well in darkness.
skills: Excels in Dexterity, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws, with a moderate level of awareness due to its +6 passive Perception.
additional_information: Can breathe both air and water due to its Amphibious trait.
Activates Frenzied Rage when taking significant damage, enhancing its combat capabilities.
Capable of casting various spells that can manipulate or control enemies.
Has a formidable armor class of 15, making it hard to hit.
Possesses a high hit point total of 153, requiring substantial effort to defeat.
spellcasting: Can cast a variety of spells, including lightning bolt and spirit guardians, enhancing its versatility in combat.
test_queries: powerful archmage from the ocean depths
chaotic evil deep one with trident
monster that can breathe underwater and cast spells
